title: Champion Idea: Aleria, Champion of the Weak
body:
**Stats**
Health: 520 (+94)
Health Regen: 8 (+0.7)
Mana: 300 (+30)
Mana Regen: 5.2 (+0.7)
Attack Damage: 65 (+4)
Attack Speed: 0.614
Movement Speed: 340
Armour: 30 (+4)
Magic Resist: 32 (+3)
Range: 175

**Roles: **Top Bruiser(AD)/Support Tank

**Abilities**

*Passive:* (The Golden Blade): Every time Aleria performs a basic attack or deals damage with a spell, she gains a stack of Golden Blade. At 5 stacks, her next basic attack becomes empowered for 5 seconds, dealing +40/60/80/100 (+20% AP) bonus magic damage on the next basic attack. For the next 6 seconds, she can't gains stacks of Golden Blade but deals +10/15/20/25 (+30% AP) bonus magic damage on basic attack.

**Q.: **(Wind Strike): Aleria's next basic attack will deal +10/20/30/40/50 (+25% Bonus AD) bonus physical damage and firing a massive blast of wind behind the target in a cone, dealing 60/70/80/90/100 (+25% Bonus AP) magic damage (but not to the original target) and interrupting any spell casts. The wind then begins to gust in the direction of the attack, granting +15/17/19/21/23% movement speed for 0.5 seconds to Arleria if she runs in its direction.
CD: 16/15/14/13/12
Mana: 55/65/75/85/95

**W.: **(Dash of Heroes): Aleria dashes to target unit. Any units in her dash path are dealt 60/70/80/90/100 magic damage, but not to the target. If she is empowered with the Golden Blade (but it is not active), targets she dashes through are dealt double damage and the targets she dashed to gains +30% movement speed for 1 second if it is an ally or 45% slow for 2 seconds if it was an enemy.
CD: 24/22/20/18/16
Mana: 100

**E.: **(Heroes of Gloria): Grant all nearby allied units +10% movement speed for 2 seconds and +30/40/50/60/70 armour and magic resist for 5 seconds. The armour and magic resist bonuses are instead +40/50/65/75/90 armour and magic resist for Aleria. If Aleria is empowered with the Golden Blade (but is not active) she instead deals 80/100/120/140/160 (+20% Armour)(+20% Magic Resist) magic damage to nearby enemies and slowing them by 35% for 3 seconds.
CD: 20
Mana: 70/75/80/85/90

**R.: **(Glorious Purification): After a 2.5 second channel, Aleria unleashes an ultimate blast of holy energy onto a target enemy champion, dealing 300/400/500 (+0/25/35% bonus AD) magic damage to the target;. This also unleashes a line of holy energy that goes 1200 units behind the target and on the path towards the target. This deals 90/11/130 (+35% AP) magic damage to units it passes through.
CD: 120/110/100
Mana: 120
